com.getstream.sdk.chat.utils.exomedia.core.video

Class ResizingTextureView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.TextureView
        • com.getstream.sdk.chat.utils.exomedia.core.video.ResizingTextureView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, ClearableSurface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExoTextureVideoView, NativeTextureVideoView

    public class ResizingTextureView
extends android.view.TextureView
implements ClearableSurface
    A TextureView that reSizes itself according to the requested layout type once we have a video

      • setOnSizeChangeListener

        public void setOnSizeChangeListener(ResizingTextureView.OnSizeChangeListener listener)
        Specifies the listener to notify of surface size changes.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to notify of surface size changes

      • clearSurface

        public void clearSurface()
        Clears the frames from the current surface. This should only be called when the implementing video view has finished playback or otherwise released the surface
        Specified by:
        clearSurface in interface ClearableSurface

      • updateVideoSize

        protected boolean updateVideoSize(int width,
                                  int height)
        Updates the stored videoSize and updates the default buffer size in the backing texture view.
        Parameters:
        width - The width for the video
        height - The height for the video
        Returns:
        True if the surfaces DefaultBufferSize was updated

      • setScaleType

        public void setScaleType(ScaleType scaleType)
        Sets the scaling method to use for the video
        Parameters:
        scaleType - The scale type to use

      • getScaleType

        public ScaleType getScaleType()
        Retrieves the current ScaleType being used
        Returns:
        The current ScaleType being used

      • setMeasureBasedOnAspectRatioEnabled

        public void setMeasureBasedOnAspectRatioEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Specifies if the onMeasure(int, int) should pay attention to the specified aspect ratio for the video (determined from videoSize.
        Parameters:
        enabled - True if onMeasure(int, int) should pay attention to the videos aspect ratio

      • setVideoRotation

        public void setVideoRotation(int rotation,
                             boolean fromUser)
        Sets the rotation for the Video
        Parameters:
        rotation - The rotation to apply to the video
        fromUser - True if the rotation was requested by the user, false if it is from a video configuration

      • setVideoRotation

        public void setVideoRotation(int userRotation,
                             int configurationRotation)
        Specifies the rotation that should be applied to the video for both the user requested value and the value specified in the videos configuration.
        Parameters:
        userRotation - The rotation the user wants to apply
        configurationRotation - The rotation specified in the configuration for the video

      • updateMatrixOnLayout

        protected void updateMatrixOnLayout()
        Requests for the Matrix to be updated on layout changes. This will ensure that the scaling is correct and the rotation is not lost or applied incorrectly.

      • notifyOnSizeChangeListener

        protected void notifyOnSizeChangeListener(int width,
                                          int height)
        Performs the functionality to notify the listener that the size of the surface has changed filtering out duplicate calls.
        Parameters:
        width - The new width
        height - The new height
